description: Timeout in milliseconds to display rich hints showing available commands after a keystroke is pressed. Rich hints display next possible keystroke options and their associated commands in an expandable popup. Set to 0 to completely disable rich hints, or use values between 1-10000 ms for the delay before hints appear.
valueDescription: Timeout in milliseconds (0 disables, valid range 0-10000)

values.description: Disable rich hints completely - no keystroke hints will be shown
Show rich hints after 1000ms (default, one second delay)
Show rich hints after 2000ms (slower response for less distraction)

notes: Values outside the 1-10000 range (except 0) are treated as invalid and hints will not be shown. The value is used to set a setTimeout delay before calling showRichHints(). This setting is commonly used to avoid visual clutter while still providing command hints after a brief pause.

example.description: Disable rich hints to reduce visual distraction
